mapper.select: select to_char(r.reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reservation_st, r.reservation_num, u.user_name, u.user_tel, p.pet_name from tb_reservation r, tb_user u, tb_petservice p where r.reservation_num = p.reservation_num and u.user_id = r.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id} order by r.reservation_num desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as recNum, to_char(r.reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reservation_st, r.reservation_state,r.reservation_num, u.user_name, u.user_tel, p.pet_name from tb_reservation r, tb_user u, tb_petservice p where r.reservation_num = p.reservation_num and u.user_id = r.user_id and r.user_id = #{user_id} ) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10 order by reservation_num desc
